recipe.title: Salmon Salad Sandwiches on Ciabatta
ingredients: 2 grilled salmon fillets (about 7 ounces each), skin removed, fish flaked
instructions: Place first 4 ingredients in medium bowl; stir in mayonnaise to taste. Season with salt and pepper. Halve each bread square horizontally. Top 4 pieces with arugula, then salmon; cover with remaining bread.
